name: 8-Bit Yu-No's Great Adventure
overview: Included as a download code with pre-orders of the Day 1 Edition of YU-NO: A girl who chants love at the bound of this world. 8-Bit Yu-No's Great Adventure is a cute and hazardous journey through a pixelated fantasy world filled with monsters and mayhem! The storyline follows the protagonist, Yu-No, who must rescue her kidnapped sister from the clutches of an evil sorcerer. As players guide Yu-No through various levels, they encounter a diverse cast of characters and face challenging enemies and obstacles along the way. Gameplay is fast-paced and action-packed. Players must navigate through intricately designed levels, utilizing Yu-No's abilities to overcome enemies, traps, and puzzles. Each level offers a unique and creative layout, filled with secrets and surprises. Exploration is encouraged, as players can discover hidden paths, collect power-ups, and uncover secrets that enhance gameplay experience.
